03893                                     struct lfsck_component *com);
03894 
03895 static int lfsck_layout_reset(const struct lu_env *env,
03896                               struct lfsck_component *com, bool init)
03897 {
03898         struct lfsck_layout     *lo    = com->lc_file_ram;
03899         int                      rc;
03900 
03901         down_write(&com->lc_sem);
03902         if (init) {
03903                 memset(lo, 0, com->lc_file_size);
03904         } else {
03905                 __u32 count = lo->ll_success_count;
03906                 __u64 last_time = lo->ll_time_last_complete;
03907 
03908                 memset(lo, 0, com->lc_file_size);
03909                 lo->ll_success_count = count;
03910                 lo->ll_time_last_complete = last_time;
03911         }
03912 
03913         lo->ll_magic = LFSCK_LAYOUT_MAGIC;
03914         lo->ll_status = LS_INIT;
03915 
03916         if (com->lc_lfsck->li_master) {
03917                 struct lfsck_assistant_data *lad = com->lc_data;
03918 
03919                 lad->lad_incomplete = 0;
03920                 CFS_RESET_BITMAP(lad->lad_bitmap);
03921         }
03922 
03923         rc = lfsck_layout_store(env, com);
03924         up_write(&com->lc_sem);
03925 
03926         CDEBUG(D_LFSCK, "%s: layout LFSCK reset: rc = %d\n",
03927                lfsck_lfsck2name(com->lc_lfsck), rc);
03928 
03929         return rc;
03930 }
03931 
03932 static void lfsck_layout_fail(const struct lu_env *env,
03933                               struct lfsck_component *com, bool new_checked)
03934 {
03935         struct lfsck_layout *lo = com->lc_file_ram;
03936 
03937         down_write(&com->lc_sem);
03938         if (new_checked)
03939                 com->lc_new_checked++;
03940         lfsck_layout_record_failure(env, com->lc_lfsck, lo);
03941         up_write(&com->lc_sem);
03942 }
03943 
03944 static int lfsck_layout_master_checkpoint(const struct lu_env *env,
03945                                           struct lfsck_component *com, bool init)
03946 {
03947         struct lfsck_instance   *lfsck   = com->lc_lfsck;
03948         struct lfsck_layout     *lo      = com->lc_file_ram;
03949         int                      rc;
03950 
03951         if (!init) {
03952                 rc = lfsck_checkpoint_generic(env, com);
03953                 if (rc != 0)
03954                         return rc > 0 ? 0 : rc;
03955         }
03956 
03957         down_write(&com->lc_sem);
03958         if (init) {
03959                 lo->ll_pos_latest_start =
03960                                 lfsck->li_pos_checkpoint.lp_oit_cookie;
03961         } else {
03962                 lo->ll_pos_last_checkpoint =
03963                                 lfsck->li_pos_checkpoint.lp_oit_cookie;
03964                 lo->ll_run_time_phase1 += cfs_duration_sec(cfs_time_current() +
03965                                 HALF_SEC - lfsck->li_time_last_checkpoint);
03966                 lo->ll_time_last_checkpoint = cfs_time_current_sec();
03967                 lo->ll_objs_checked_phase1 += com->lc_new_checked;
03968                 com->lc_new_checked = 0;
03969         }
03970 
03971         rc = lfsck_layout_store(env, com);
03972         up_write(&com->lc_sem);
03973 
03974         CDEBUG(D_LFSCK, "%s: layout LFSCK master checkpoint at the pos ["
03975                LPU64"], status = %d: rc = %d\n", lfsck_lfsck2name(lfsck),
03976                lfsck->li_pos_current.lp_oit_cookie, lo->ll_status, rc);
03977 
03978         return rc;
03979 }
03980 
03981 static int lfsck_layout_slave_checkpoint(const struct lu_env *env,
03982                                          struct lfsck_component *com, bool init)
03983 {
03984         struct lfsck_instance   *lfsck = com->lc_lfsck;
03985         struct lfsck_layout     *lo    = com->lc_file_ram;
03986         int                      rc;
03987 
03988         if (com->lc_new_checked == 0 && !init)
03989                 return 0;
03990 
03991         down_write(&com->lc_sem);
03992         if (init) {
03993                 lo->ll_pos_latest_start =
03994                                 lfsck->li_pos_checkpoint.lp_oit_cookie;
03995         } else {
03996                 lo->ll_pos_last_checkpoint =
03997                                 lfsck->li_pos_checkpoint.lp_oit_cookie;
03998                 lo->ll_run_time_phase1 += cfs_duration_sec(cfs_time_current() +
03999                                 HALF_SEC - lfsck->li_time_last_checkpoint);
04000                 lo->ll_time_last_checkpoint = cfs_time_current_sec();
04001                 lo->ll_objs_checked_phase1 += com->lc_new_checked;
04002                 com->lc_new_checked = 0;
04003         }
04004 
04005         rc = lfsck_layout_store(env, com);
04006         up_write(&com->lc_sem);
04007 
04008         CDEBUG(D_LFSCK, "%s: layout LFSCK slave checkpoint at the pos ["
04009                LPU64"], status = %d: rc = %d\n", lfsck_lfsck2name(lfsck),
04010                lfsck->li_pos_current.lp_oit_cookie, lo->ll_status, rc);
04011 
04012         return rc;
04013 }
04014 
04015 static int lfsck_layout_prep(const struct lu_env *env,
04016                              struct lfsck_component *com,
04017                              struct lfsck_start *start)
04018 {
04019         struct lfsck_instance   *lfsck  = com->lc_lfsck;
04020         struct lfsck_layout     *lo     = com->lc_file_ram;
04021         struct lfsck_position   *pos    = &com->lc_pos_start;
04022 
04023         fid_zero(&pos->lp_dir_parent);
04024         pos->lp_dir_cookie = 0;
04025         if (lo->ll_status == LS_COMPLETED ||
04026             lo->ll_status == LS_PARTIAL ||
04027             /* To handle orphan, must scan from the beginning. */
04028             (start != NULL && start->ls_flags & LPF_OST_ORPHAN)) {
04029                 int rc;
04030 
04031                 rc = lfsck_layout_reset(env, com, false);
04032                 if (rc == 0)
04033                         rc = lfsck_set_param(env, lfsck, start, true);
04034 
04035                 if (rc != 0) {
04036                         CDEBUG(D_LFSCK, "%s: layout LFSCK prep failed: "
04037                                "rc = %d\n", lfsck_lfsck2name(lfsck), rc);
04038 
04039                         return rc;
04040                 }
04041         }
04042 
04043         down_write(&com->lc_sem);
04044         lo->ll_time_latest_start = cfs_time_current_sec();
04045         spin_lock(&lfsck->li_lock);
04046         if (lo->ll_flags & LF_SCANNED_ONCE) {
04047                 if (!lfsck->li_drop_dryrun ||
04048                     lo->ll_pos_first_inconsistent == 0) {
04049                         lo->ll_status = LS_SCANNING_PHASE2;
04050                         list_move_tail(&com->lc_link,
04051                                        &lfsck->li_list_double_scan);
04052                         pos->lp_oit_cookie = 0;
04053                 } else {
04054                         int i;
04055 
04056                         lo->ll_status = LS_SCANNING_PHASE1;
04057                         lo->ll_run_time_phase1 = 0;
04058                         lo->ll_run_time_phase2 = 0;
04059                         lo->ll_objs_checked_phase1 = 0;
04060                         lo->ll_objs_checked_phase2 = 0;
04061                         lo->ll_objs_failed_phase1 = 0;
04062                         lo->ll_objs_failed_phase2 = 0;
04063                         for (i = 0; i < LLIT_MAX; i++)
04064                                 lo->ll_objs_repaired[i] = 0;
04065 
04066                         pos->lp_oit_cookie = lo->ll_pos_first_inconsistent;
04067                         fid_zero(&com->lc_fid_latest_scanned_phase2);
04068                 }
04069         } else {
04070                 lo->ll_status = LS_SCANNING_PHASE1;
04071                 if (!lfsck->li_drop_dryrun ||
04072                     lo->ll_pos_first_inconsistent == 0)
04073                         pos->lp_oit_cookie = lo->ll_pos_last_checkpoint + 1;
04074                 else
04075                         pos->lp_oit_cookie = lo->ll_pos_first_inconsistent;
04076         }
04077         spin_unlock(&lfsck->li_lock);
04078         up_write(&com->lc_sem);
04079 
04080         return 0;
04081 }
04082 
04083 static int lfsck_layout_slave_prep(const struct lu_env *env,
04084                                    struct lfsck_component *com,
04085                                    struct lfsck_start_param *lsp)
04086 {
04087         struct lfsck_layout_slave_data  *llsd   = com->lc_data;
04088         struct lfsck_instance           *lfsck  = com->lc_lfsck;
04089         struct lfsck_layout             *lo     = com->lc_file_ram;
04090         struct lfsck_start              *start  = lsp->lsp_start;
04091         int                              rc;
04092 
04093         rc = lfsck_layout_prep(env, com, start);
04094         if (rc != 0)
04095                 return rc;
04096 
04097         if (lo->ll_flags & LF_CRASHED_LASTID &&
04098             list_empty(&llsd->llsd_master_list)) {
04099                 LASSERT(lfsck->li_out_notify != NULL);
04100 
04101                 lfsck->li_out_notify(env, lfsck->li_out_notify_data,
04102                                      LE_LASTID_REBUILDING);
04103         }
04104 
04105         if (!lsp->lsp_index_valid)
04106                 return 0;
04107 
04108         rc = lfsck_layout_llst_add(llsd, lsp->lsp_index);
04109         if (rc == 0 && start != NULL && start->ls_flags & LPF_OST_ORPHAN) {
04110                 LASSERT(!llsd->llsd_rbtree_valid);
04111 
04112                 write_lock(&llsd->llsd_rb_lock);
04113                 rc = lfsck_rbtree_setup(env, com);
04114                 write_unlock(&llsd->llsd_rb_lock);
04115         }
04116 
04117         CDEBUG(D_LFSCK, "%s: layout LFSCK slave prep done, start pos ["
04118                LPU64"]\n", lfsck_lfsck2name(lfsck),
04119                com->lc_pos_start.lp_oit_cookie);
04120 
04121         return rc;
04122 }
04123 
04124 static int lfsck_layout_master_prep(const struct lu_env *env,
04125                                     struct lfsck_component *com,
04126                                     struct lfsck_start_param *lsp)
04127 {
04128         int rc;
04129         ENTRY;
04130 
04131         rc = lfsck_layout_load_bitmap(env, com);
04132         if (rc != 0) {
04133                 rc = lfsck_layout_reset(env, com, false);
04134                 if (rc == 0)
04135                         rc = lfsck_set_param(env, com->lc_lfsck,
04136                                              lsp->lsp_start, true);
04137 
04138                 if (rc != 0)
04139                         GOTO(log, rc);
04140         }
04141 
04142         rc = lfsck_layout_prep(env, com, lsp->lsp_start);
04143         if (rc != 0)
04144                 RETURN(rc);
04145 
04146         rc = lfsck_start_assistant(env, com, lsp);
04147 
04148         GOTO(log, rc);
04149 
04150 log:
04151         CDEBUG(D_LFSCK, "%s: layout LFSCK master prep done, start pos ["
04152                LPU64"]\n", lfsck_lfsck2name(com->lc_lfsck),
04153                com->lc_pos_start.lp_oit_cookie);
04154 
04155         return 0;
04156 }
04157 
04158 /* Pre-fetch the attribute for each stripe in the given layout EA. */
04159 static int lfsck_layout_scan_stripes(const struct lu_env *env,
04160                                      struct lfsck_component *com,
04161                                      struct dt_object *parent,
04162                                      struct lov_mds_md_v1 *lmm)
04163 {
04164         struct lfsck_thread_info        *info    = lfsck_env_info(env);
04165         struct lfsck_instance           *lfsck   = com->lc_lfsck;
04166         struct lfsck_bookmark           *bk      = &lfsck->li_bookmark_ram;
04167         struct lfsck_layout             *lo      = com->lc_file_ram;
04168         struct lfsck_assistant_data     *lad     = com->lc_data;
04169         struct lfsck_assistant_object   *lso     = NULL;
04170         struct lov_ost_data_v1          *objs;
04171         struct lfsck_tgt_descs          *ltds    = &lfsck->li_ost_descs;
04172         struct ptlrpc_thread            *mthread = &lfsck->li_thread;
04173         struct ptlrpc_thread            *athread = &lad->lad_thread;
04174         struct l_wait_info               lwi     = { 0 };
04175         struct lu_buf                    buf;
04176         int                              rc      = 0;
04177         int                              i;
04178         __u32                            magic;
04179         __u16                            count;
04180         ENTRY;
04181 
04182         lfsck_buf_init(&buf, &info->lti_old_pfid,
04183                        sizeof(struct filter_fid_old));
04184         count = le16_to_cpu(lmm->lmm_stripe_count);
04185         /* Currently, we only support LOV_MAGIC_V1/LOV_MAGIC_V3 which has
04186          * been verified in lfsck_layout_verify_header() already. If some
04187          * new magic introduced in the future, then layout LFSCK needs to
04188          * be updated also. */
04189         magic = le32_to_cpu(lmm->lmm_magic);
04190         if (magic == LOV_MAGIC_V1) {
04191                 objs = &lmm->lmm_objects[0];
04192         } else {
04193                 LASSERT(magic == LOV_MAGIC_V3);
04194                 objs = &((struct lov_mds_md_v3 *)lmm)->lmm_objects[0];
04195         }
04196 
04197         for (i = 0; i < count; i++, objs++) {
04198                 struct lu_fid           *fid    = &info->lti_fid;
04199                 struct ost_id           *oi     = &info->lti_oi;
04200                 struct lfsck_layout_req *llr;
04201                 struct lfsck_tgt_desc   *tgt    = NULL;
04202                 struct dt_object        *cobj   = NULL;
04203                 __u32                    index;
04204                 bool                     wakeup = false;
04205 
04206                 if (unlikely(lovea_slot_is_dummy(objs)))
04207                         continue;
04208 
04209                 l_wait_event(mthread->t_ctl_waitq,
04210                              lad->lad_prefetched < bk->lb_async_windows ||
04211                              !thread_is_running(mthread) ||
04212                              thread_is_stopped(athread),
04213                              &lwi);
04214 
04215                 if (unlikely(!thread_is_running(mthread)) ||
04216                              thread_is_stopped(athread))
04217                         GOTO(out, rc = 0);
04218 
04219                 if (unlikely(lfsck_is_dead_obj(parent)))
04220                         GOTO(out, rc = 0);
04221 
04222                 ostid_le_to_cpu(&objs->l_ost_oi, oi);
04223                 index = le32_to_cpu(objs->l_ost_idx);
04224                 rc = ostid_to_fid(fid, oi, index);
04225                 if (rc != 0) {
04226                         CDEBUG(D_LFSCK, "%s: get invalid layout EA for "DFID
04227                                ": "DOSTID", idx:%u\n", lfsck_lfsck2name(lfsck),
04228                                PFID(lfsck_dto2fid(parent)), POSTID(oi), index);
04229                         goto next;
04230                 }
04231 
04232                 tgt = lfsck_tgt_get(ltds, index);
04233                 if (unlikely(tgt == NULL)) {
04234                         CDEBUG(D_LFSCK, "%s: cannot talk with OST %x which "
04235                                "did not join the layout LFSCK\n",
04236                                lfsck_lfsck2name(lfsck), index);
04237                         lfsck_lad_set_bitmap(env, com, index);
04238                         goto next;
04239                 }
04240 
04241                 /* There is potential deadlock race condition between object
04242                  * destroy and layout LFSCK. Consider the following scenario:
04243                  *
04244                  * 1) The LFSCK thread obtained the parent object firstly, at
04245                  *    that time, the parent object has not been destroyed yet.
04246                  *
04247                  * 2) One RPC service thread destroyed the parent and all its
04248                  *    children objects. Because the LFSCK is referencing the
04249                  *    parent object, then the parent object will be marked as
04250                  *    dying in RAM. On the other hand, the parent object is
04251                  *    referencing all its children objects, then all children
04252                  *    objects will be marked as dying in RAM also.
04253                  *
04254                  * 3) The LFSCK thread tries to find some child object with
04255                  *    the parent object referenced. Then it will find that the
04256                  *    child object is dying. According to the object visibility
04257                  *    rules: the object with dying flag cannot be returned to
04258                  *    others. So the LFSCK thread has to wait until the dying
04259                  *    object has been purged from RAM, then it can allocate a
04260                  *    new object (with the same FID) in RAM. Unfortunately, the
04261                  *    LFSCK thread itself is referencing the parent object, and
04262                  *    cause the parent object cannot be purged, then cause the
04263                  *    child object cannot be purged also. So the LFSCK thread
04264                  *    will fall into deadlock.
04265                  *
04266                  * We introduce non-blocked version lu_object_find() to allow
04267                  * the LFSCK thread to return failure immediately (instead of
04268                  * wait) when it finds dying (child) object, then the LFSCK
04269                  * thread can check whether the parent object is dying or not.
04270                  * So avoid above deadlock. LU-5395 */
04271                 cobj = lfsck_object_find_by_dev_nowait(env, tgt->ltd_tgt, fid);
04272                 if (IS_ERR(cobj)) {
04273                         if (lfsck_is_dead_obj(parent)) {
04274                                 lfsck_tgt_put(tgt);
04275 
04276                                 GOTO(out, rc = 0);
04277                         }
04278 
04279                         rc = PTR_ERR(cobj);
04280                         goto next;
04281                 }
04282 
04283                 if (!OBD_FAIL_CHECK(OBD_FAIL_LFSCK_ASSISTANT_DIRECT)) {
04284                         rc = dt_declare_attr_get(env, cobj);
04285                         if (rc != 0)
04286                                 goto next;
04287 
04288                         rc = dt_declare_xattr_get(env, cobj, &buf,
04289                                                   XATTR_NAME_FID);
04290                         if (rc != 0)
04291                                 goto next;
04292                 }
04293 
04294                 if (lso == NULL) {
04295                         struct lu_attr *attr = &info->lti_la;
04296 
04297                         rc = dt_attr_get(env, parent, attr);
04298                         if (rc != 0)
04299                                 goto next;
04300 
04301                         lso = lfsck_assistant_object_init(env,
04302                                 lfsck_dto2fid(parent), attr,
04303                                 lfsck->li_pos_current.lp_oit_cookie, false);
04304                         if (IS_ERR(lso)) {
04305                                 rc = PTR_ERR(lso);
04306                                 lso = NULL;
04307 
04308                                 goto next;
04309                         }
04310                 }
04311 
04312                 llr = lfsck_layout_assistant_req_init(lso, cobj, index, i);
04313                 if (IS_ERR(llr)) {
04314                         rc = PTR_ERR(llr);
04315                         goto next;
04316                 }
04317 
04318                 cobj = NULL;
04319                 spin_lock(&lad->lad_lock);
04320                 if (lad->lad_assistant_status < 0) {
04321                         spin_unlock(&lad->lad_lock);
04322                         lfsck_layout_assistant_req_fini(env, &llr->llr_lar);
04323                         lfsck_tgt_put(tgt);
04324                         RETURN(lad->lad_assistant_status);
04325                 }
04326 
04327                 list_add_tail(&llr->llr_lar.lar_list, &lad->lad_req_list);
04328                 if (lad->lad_prefetched == 0)
04329                         wakeup = true;
04330 
04331                 lad->lad_prefetched++;
04332                 spin_unlock(&lad->lad_lock);
04333                 if (wakeup)
04334                         wake_up_all(&athread->t_ctl_waitq);
04335 
04336 next:
04337                 down_write(&com->lc_sem);
04338                 com->lc_new_checked++;
04339                 if (rc < 0)
04340                         lfsck_layout_record_failure(env, lfsck, lo);
04341                 up_write(&com->lc_sem);
04342 
04343                 if (cobj != NULL && !IS_ERR(cobj))
04344                         lfsck_object_put(env, cobj);
04345 
04346                 if (likely(tgt != NULL))
04347                         lfsck_tgt_put(tgt);
04348 
04349                 if (rc < 0 && bk->lb_param & LPF_FAILOUT)
04350                         GOTO(out, rc);
04351         }
04352 
04353         GOTO(out, rc = 0);
04354 
04355 out:
04356         if (lso != NULL)
04357                 lfsck_assistant_object_put(env, lso);
04358 
04359         return rc;
04360 }
04361 
04362 /* For the given object, read its layout EA locally. For each stripe, pre-fetch
04363  * the OST-object's attribute and generate an structure lfsck_layout_req on the
04364  * list ::lad_req_list.
04365  *
04366  * For each request on above list, the lfsck_layout_assistant thread compares
04367  * the OST side attribute with local attribute, if inconsistent, then repair it.
04368  *
04369  * All above processing is async mode with pipeline. */
04370 static int lfsck_layout_master_exec_oit(const struct lu_env *env,
04371                                         struct lfsck_component *com,
04372                                         struct dt_object *obj)
04373 {
04374         struct lfsck_thread_info        *info   = lfsck_env_info(env);
04375         struct ost_id                   *oi     = &info->lti_oi;
04376         struct lfsck_layout             *lo     = com->lc_file_ram;
04377         struct lfsck_assistant_data     *lad    = com->lc_data;
04378         struct lfsck_instance           *lfsck  = com->lc_lfsck;
04379         struct lfsck_bookmark           *bk     = &lfsck->li_bookmark_ram;
04380         struct thandle                  *handle = NULL;
04381         struct lu_buf                   *buf    = &info->lti_big_buf;
04382         struct lov_mds_md_v1            *lmm    = NULL;
04383         struct dt_device                *dev    = lfsck_obj2dev(obj);
04384         struct lustre_handle             lh     = { 0 };
04385         struct lu_buf                    ea_buf = { NULL };
04386         int                              rc     = 0;
04387         int                              size   = 0;
04388         bool                             locked = false;
04389         bool                             stripe = false;
04390         bool                             bad_oi = false;
04391         ENTRY;
04392 
04393         if (!S_ISREG(lfsck_object_type(obj)))
04394                 GOTO(out, rc = 0);
04395 
04396         if (lad->lad_assistant_status < 0)
04397                 GOTO(out, rc = -ESRCH);
04398 
04399         fid_to_lmm_oi(lfsck_dto2fid(obj), oi);
04400         lmm_oi_cpu_to_le(oi, oi);
04401         dt_read_lock(env, obj, 0);
04402         locked = true;
04403 
04404 again:
04405         if (dt_object_exists(obj) == 0 ||
04406             lfsck_is_dead_obj(obj))
04407                 GOTO(out, rc = 0);
04408 
04409         rc = lfsck_layout_get_lovea(env, obj, buf);
04410         if (rc <= 0)
04411                 GOTO(out, rc);
04412 
04413         size = rc;
04414         lmm = buf->lb_buf;
04415         rc = lfsck_layout_verify_header(lmm);
04416         /* If the LOV EA crashed, then it is possible to be rebuilt later
04417          * when handle orphan OST-objects. */
04418         if (rc != 0)
04419                 GOTO(out, rc);
04420 
04421         if (memcmp(oi, &lmm->lmm_oi, sizeof(*oi)) == 0)
04422                 GOTO(out, stripe = true);
04423 
04424         /* Inconsistent lmm_oi, should be repaired. */
04425         bad_oi = true;
04426         lmm->lmm_oi = *oi;
04427 
04428         if (bk->lb_param & LPF_DRYRUN) {
04429                 lo->ll_objs_repaired[LLIT_OTHERS - 1]++;
04430 
04431                 GOTO(out, stripe = true);
04432         }
04433 
04434         if (!lustre_handle_is_used(&lh)) {
04435                 dt_read_unlock(env, obj);
04436                 locked = false;
04437                 rc = lfsck_ibits_lock(env, lfsck, obj, &lh,
04438                                       MDS_INODELOCK_LAYOUT |
04439                                       MDS_INODELOCK_XATTR, LCK_EX);
04440                 if (rc != 0)
04441                         GOTO(out, rc);
04442 
04443                 handle = dt_trans_create(env, dev);
04444                 if (IS_ERR(handle))
04445                         GOTO(out, rc = PTR_ERR(handle));
04446 
04447                 lfsck_buf_init(&ea_buf, lmm, size);
04448                 rc = dt_declare_xattr_set(env, obj, &ea_buf, XATTR_NAME_LOV,
04449                                           LU_XATTR_REPLACE, handle);
04450                 if (rc != 0)
04451                         GOTO(out, rc);
04452 
04453                 rc = dt_trans_start_local(env, dev, handle);
04454                 if (rc != 0)
04455                         GOTO(out, rc);
04456 
04457                 dt_write_lock(env, obj, 0);
04458                 locked = true;
04459 
04460                 goto again;
04461         }
04462 
04463         rc = dt_xattr_set(env, obj, &ea_buf, XATTR_NAME_LOV,
04464                           LU_XATTR_REPLACE, handle);
04465         if (rc != 0)
04466                 GOTO(out, rc);
04467 
04468         lo->ll_objs_repaired[LLIT_OTHERS - 1]++;
04469 
04470         GOTO(out, stripe = true);
04471 
04472 out:
04473         if (locked) {
04474                 if (lustre_handle_is_used(&lh))
04475                         dt_write_unlock(env, obj);
04476                 else
04477                         dt_read_unlock(env, obj);
04478         }
04479 
04480         if (handle != NULL && !IS_ERR(handle))
04481                 dt_trans_stop(env, dev, handle);
04482 
04483         lfsck_ibits_unlock(&lh, LCK_EX);
04484 
04485         if (bad_oi)
04486                 CDEBUG(D_LFSCK, "%s: layout LFSCK master %s bad lmm_oi for "
04487                        DFID": rc = %d\n", lfsck_lfsck2name(lfsck),
04488                        bk->lb_param & LPF_DRYRUN ? "found" : "repaired",
04489                        PFID(lfsck_dto2fid(obj)), rc);
04490 
04491         if (stripe) {
04492                 rc = lfsck_layout_scan_stripes(env, com, obj, lmm);
04493         } else {
04494                 down_write(&com->lc_sem);
04495                 com->lc_new_checked++;
04496                 if (rc < 0)
04497                         lfsck_layout_record_failure(env, lfsck, lo);
04498                 up_write(&com->lc_sem);
04499         }
04500 
04501         return rc;
04502 }
04503 
04504 static int lfsck_layout_slave_exec_oit(const struct lu_env *env,
04505                                        struct lfsck_component *com,
04506                                        struct dt_object *obj)
04507 {
04508         struct lfsck_instance           *lfsck  = com->lc_lfsck;
04509         struct lfsck_layout             *lo     = com->lc_file_ram;
04510         const struct lu_fid             *fid    = lfsck_dto2fid(obj);
04511         struct lfsck_layout_slave_data  *llsd   = com->lc_data;
04512         struct lfsck_layout_seq         *lls;
04513         __u64                            seq;
04514         __u64                            oid;
04515         int                              rc;
04516         ENTRY;
04517 
04518         LASSERT(llsd != NULL);
04519 
04520         if (OBD_FAIL_CHECK(OBD_FAIL_LFSCK_DELAY5) &&
04521             cfs_fail_val == lfsck_dev_idx(lfsck)) {
04522                 struct l_wait_info       lwi = LWI_TIMEOUT(cfs_time_seconds(1),
04523                                                            NULL, NULL);
04524                 struct ptlrpc_thread    *thread = &lfsck->li_thread;
04525 
04526                 l_wait_event(thread->t_ctl_waitq,
04527                              !thread_is_running(thread),
04528                              &lwi);
04529         }
04530 
04531         lfsck_rbtree_update_bitmap(env, com, fid, false);
04532 
04533         down_write(&com->lc_sem);
04534         if (fid_is_idif(fid))
04535                 seq = 0;
04536         else if (!fid_is_norm(fid) ||
04537                  !fid_is_for_ostobj(env, lfsck, obj, fid))
04538                 GOTO(unlock, rc = 0);
04539         else
04540                 seq = fid_seq(fid);
04541         com->lc_new_checked++;
04542 
04543         lls = lfsck_layout_seq_lookup(llsd, seq);
04544         if (lls == NULL) {
04545                 OBD_ALLOC_PTR(lls);
04546                 if (unlikely(lls == NULL))
04547                         GOTO(unlock, rc = -ENOMEM);
04548 
04549                 INIT_LIST_HEAD(&lls->lls_list);
04550                 lls->lls_seq = seq;
04551                 rc = lfsck_layout_lastid_load(env, com, lls);
04552                 if (rc != 0) {
04553                         CDEBUG(D_LFSCK, "%s: layout LFSCK failed to "
04554                               "load LAST_ID for "LPX64": rc = %d\n",
04555                               lfsck_lfsck2name(com->lc_lfsck), seq, rc);
04556                         lo->ll_objs_failed_phase1++;
04557                         OBD_FREE_PTR(lls);
04558                         GOTO(unlock, rc);
04559                 }
04560 
04561                 lfsck_layout_seq_insert(llsd, lls);
04562         }
04563 
04564         if (unlikely(fid_is_last_id(fid)))
04565                 GOTO(unlock, rc = 0);
04566 
04567         if (fid_is_idif(fid))
04568                 oid = fid_idif_id(fid_seq(fid), fid_oid(fid), fid_ver(fid));
04569         else
04570                 oid = fid_oid(fid);
04571 
04572         if (oid > lls->lls_lastid_known)
04573                 lls->lls_lastid_known = oid;
04574 
04575         if (oid > lls->lls_lastid) {
04576                 if (!(lo->ll_flags & LF_CRASHED_LASTID)) {
04577                         /* OFD may create new objects during LFSCK scanning. */
04578                         rc = lfsck_layout_lastid_reload(env, com, lls);
04579                         if (unlikely(rc != 0)) {
04580                                 CDEBUG(D_LFSCK, "%s: layout LFSCK failed to "
04581                                       "reload LAST_ID for "LPX64": rc = %d\n",
04582                                       lfsck_lfsck2name(com->lc_lfsck),
04583                                       lls->lls_seq, rc);
04584 
04585                                 GOTO(unlock, rc);
04586                         }
04587 
04588                         if (oid <= lls->lls_lastid ||
04589                             lo->ll_flags & LF_CRASHED_LASTID)
04590                                 GOTO(unlock, rc = 0);
04591 
04592                         LASSERT(lfsck->li_out_notify != NULL);
04593 
04594                         lfsck->li_out_notify(env, lfsck->li_out_notify_data,
04595                                              LE_LASTID_REBUILDING);
04596                         lo->ll_flags |= LF_CRASHED_LASTID;
04597 
04598                         CDEBUG(D_LFSCK, "%s: layout LFSCK finds crashed "
04599                                "LAST_ID file (2) for the sequence "LPX64
04600                                ", old value "LPU64", known value "LPU64"\n",
04601                                lfsck_lfsck2name(lfsck), lls->lls_seq,
04602                                lls->lls_lastid, oid);
04603                 }
04604 
04605                 lls->lls_lastid = oid;
04606                 lls->lls_dirty = 1;
04607         }
04608 
04609         GOTO(unlock, rc = 0);
04610 
04611 unlock:
04612         up_write(&com->lc_sem);
04613 
04614         return rc;
04615 }
04616 
04617 static int lfsck_layout_exec_dir(const struct lu_env *env,
04618                                  struct lfsck_component *com,
04619                                  struct lfsck_assistant_object *lso,
04620                                  struct lu_dirent *ent, __u16 type)
04621 {
04622         return 0;
04623 }
04624 
04625 static int lfsck_layout_master_post(const struct lu_env *env,
04626                                     struct lfsck_component *com,
04627                                     int result, bool init)
04628 {
04629         struct lfsck_instance   *lfsck  = com->lc_lfsck;
04630         struct lfsck_layout     *lo     = com->lc_file_ram;
04631         int                      rc;
04632         ENTRY;
04633 
04634         lfsck_post_generic(env, com, &result);
04635 
04636         down_write(&com->lc_sem);
04637         spin_lock(&lfsck->li_lock);
04638         if (!init)
04639                 lo->ll_pos_last_checkpoint =
04640                                 lfsck->li_pos_checkpoint.lp_oit_cookie;
04641 
04642         if (result > 0) {
04643                 if (lo->ll_flags & LF_INCOMPLETE)
04644                         lo->ll_status = LS_PARTIAL;
04645                 else
04646                         lo->ll_status = LS_SCANNING_PHASE2;
04647                 lo->ll_flags |= LF_SCANNED_ONCE;
04648                 lo->ll_flags &= ~LF_UPGRADE;
04649                 list_move_tail(&com->lc_link, &lfsck->li_list_double_scan);
04650         } else if (result == 0) {
04651                 if (lfsck->li_status != 0)
04652                         lo->ll_status = lfsck->li_status;
04653                 else
04654                         lo->ll_status = LS_STOPPED;
04655                 if (lo->ll_status != LS_PAUSED)
04656                         list_move_tail(&com->lc_link, &lfsck->li_list_idle);
04657         } else {
04658                 lo->ll_status = LS_FAILED;
04659                 list_move_tail(&com->lc_link, &lfsck->li_list_idle);
04660         }
04661         spin_unlock(&lfsck->li_lock);
04662 
04663         if (!init) {
04664                 lo->ll_run_time_phase1 += cfs_duration_sec(cfs_time_current() +
04665                                 HALF_SEC - lfsck->li_time_last_checkpoint);
04666                 lo->ll_time_last_checkpoint = cfs_time_current_sec();
04667                 lo->ll_objs_checked_phase1 += com->lc_new_checked;
04668                 com->lc_new_checked = 0;
04669         }
04670 
04671         rc = lfsck_layout_store(env, com);
04672         up_write(&com->lc_sem);
04673 
04674         CDEBUG(D_LFSCK, "%s: layout LFSCK master post done: rc = %d\n",
04675                lfsck_lfsck2name(lfsck), rc);
04676 
04677         RETURN(rc);
04678 }
04679 
04680 static int lfsck_layout_slave_post(const struct lu_env *env,
04681                                    struct lfsck_component *com,
04682                                    int result, bool init)
04683 {
04684         struct lfsck_instance   *lfsck = com->lc_lfsck;
04685         struct lfsck_layout     *lo    = com->lc_file_ram;
04686         int                      rc;
04687         bool                     done  = false;
04688 
04689         down_write(&com->lc_sem);
04690         rc = lfsck_layout_lastid_store(env, com);
04691         if (rc != 0)
04692                 result = rc;
04693 
04694         LASSERT(lfsck->li_out_notify != NULL);
04695 
04696         spin_lock(&lfsck->li_lock);
04697         if (!init)
04698                 lo->ll_pos_last_checkpoint =
04699                                 lfsck->li_pos_checkpoint.lp_oit_cookie;
04700 
04701         if (result > 0) {
04702                 lo->ll_status = LS_SCANNING_PHASE2;
04703                 lo->ll_flags |= LF_SCANNED_ONCE;
04704                 if (lo->ll_flags & LF_CRASHED_LASTID) {
04705                         done = true;
04706                         lo->ll_flags &= ~LF_CRASHED_LASTID;
04707 
04708                         CDEBUG(D_LFSCK, "%s: layout LFSCK has rebuilt "
04709                                "crashed LAST_ID files successfully\n",
04710                                lfsck_lfsck2name(lfsck));
04711                 }
04712                 lo->ll_flags &= ~LF_UPGRADE;
04713                 list_move_tail(&com->lc_link, &lfsck->li_list_double_scan);
04714         } else if (result == 0) {
04715                 if (lfsck->li_status != 0)
04716                         lo->ll_status = lfsck->li_status;
04717                 else
04718                         lo->ll_status = LS_STOPPED;
04719                 if (lo->ll_status != LS_PAUSED)
04720                         list_move_tail(&com->lc_link, &lfsck->li_list_idle);
04721         } else {
04722                 lo->ll_status = LS_FAILED;
04723                 list_move_tail(&com->lc_link, &lfsck->li_list_idle);
04724         }
04725         spin_unlock(&lfsck->li_lock);
04726 
04727         if (done)
04728                 lfsck->li_out_notify(env, lfsck->li_out_notify_data,
04729                                      LE_LASTID_REBUILT);
04730 
04731         if (!init) {
04732                 lo->ll_run_time_phase1 += cfs_duration_sec(cfs_time_current() +
04733                                 HALF_SEC - lfsck->li_time_last_checkpoint);
04734                 lo->ll_time_last_checkpoint = cfs_time_current_sec();
04735                 lo->ll_objs_checked_phase1 += com->lc_new_checked;
04736                 com->lc_new_checked = 0;
04737         }
04738 
04739         rc = lfsck_layout_store(env, com);
04740         up_write(&com->lc_sem);
04741 
04742         lfsck_layout_slave_notify_master(env, com, LE_PHASE1_DONE, result);
04743 
04744         CDEBUG(D_LFSCK, "%s: layout LFSCK slave post done: rc = %d\n",
04745                lfsck_lfsck2name(lfsck), rc);
04746 
04747         return rc;
04748 }
04749 
04750 static void lfsck_layout_dump(const struct lu_env *env,
04751                               struct lfsck_component *com, struct seq_file *m)
04752 {
04753         struct lfsck_instance   *lfsck = com->lc_lfsck;
04754         struct lfsck_bookmark   *bk    = &lfsck->li_bookmark_ram;
04755         struct lfsck_layout     *lo    = com->lc_file_ram;
04756 
04757         down_read(&com->lc_sem);
04758         seq_printf(m, "name: lfsck_layout\n"
04759                    "magic: %#x\n"
04760                    "version: %d\n"
04761                    "status: %s\n",
04762                    lo->ll_magic,
04763                    bk->lb_version,
04764                    lfsck_status2name(lo->ll_status));
04765 
04766         lfsck_bits_dump(m, lo->ll_flags, lfsck_flags_names, "flags");
04767 
04768         lfsck_bits_dump(m, bk->lb_param, lfsck_param_names, "param");
04769 
04770         lfsck_time_dump(m, lo->ll_time_last_complete, "last_completed");
04771 
04772         lfsck_time_dump(m, lo->ll_time_latest_start, "latest_start");
04773 
04774         lfsck_time_dump(m, lo->ll_time_last_checkpoint, "last_checkpoint");
04775 
04776         seq_printf(m, "latest_start_position: "LPU64"\n"
04777                    "last_checkpoint_position: "LPU64"\n"
04778                    "first_failure_position: "LPU64"\n",
04779                    lo->ll_pos_latest_start,
04780                    lo->ll_pos_last_checkpoint,
04781                    lo->ll_pos_first_inconsistent);
04782 
04783         seq_printf(m, "success_count: %u\n"
04784                    "repaired_dangling: "LPU64"\n"
04785                    "repaired_unmatched_pair: "LPU64"\n"
04786                    "repaired_multiple_referenced: "LPU64"\n"
04787                    "repaired_orphan: "LPU64"\n"
04788                    "repaired_inconsistent_owner: "LPU64"\n"
04789                    "repaired_others: "LPU64"\n"
04790                    "skipped: "LPU64"\n"
04791                    "failed_phase1: "LPU64"\n"
04792                    "failed_phase2: "LPU64"\n",
04793                    lo->ll_success_count,
04794                    lo->ll_objs_repaired[LLIT_DANGLING - 1],
04795                    lo->ll_objs_repaired[LLIT_UNMATCHED_PAIR - 1],
04796                    lo->ll_objs_repaired[LLIT_MULTIPLE_REFERENCED - 1],
04797                    lo->ll_objs_repaired[LLIT_ORPHAN - 1],
04798                    lo->ll_objs_repaired[LLIT_INCONSISTENT_OWNER - 1],
04799                    lo->ll_objs_repaired[LLIT_OTHERS - 1],
04800                    lo->ll_objs_skipped,
04801                    lo->ll_objs_failed_phase1,
04802                    lo->ll_objs_failed_phase2);
04803 
04804         if (lo->ll_status == LS_SCANNING_PHASE1) {
04805                 __u64 pos;
04806                 const struct dt_it_ops *iops;
04807                 cfs_duration_t duration = cfs_time_current() -
04808                                           lfsck->li_time_last_checkpoint;
04809                 __u64 checked = lo->ll_objs_checked_phase1 +
04810                                 com->lc_new_checked;
04811                 __u64 speed = checked;
04812                 __u64 new_checked = com->lc_new_checked *
04813                                     msecs_to_jiffies(MSEC_PER_SEC);
04814                 __u32 rtime = lo->ll_run_time_phase1 +
04815                               cfs_duration_sec(duration + HALF_SEC);
04816 
04817                 if (duration != 0)
04818                         do_div(new_checked, duration);
04819                 if (rtime != 0)
04820                         do_div(speed, rtime);
04821                 seq_printf(m, "checked_phase1: "LPU64"\n"
04822                            "checked_phase2: "LPU64"\n"
04823                            "run_time_phase1: %u seconds\n"
04824                            "run_time_phase2: %u seconds\n"
04825                            "average_speed_phase1: "LPU64" items/sec\n"
04826                            "average_speed_phase2: N/A\n"
04827                            "real-time_speed_phase1: "LPU64" items/sec\n"
04828                            "real-time_speed_phase2: N/A\n",
04829                            checked,
04830                            lo->ll_objs_checked_phase2,
04831                            rtime,
04832                            lo->ll_run_time_phase2,
04833                            speed,
04834                            new_checked);
04835 
04836                 LASSERT(lfsck->li_di_oit != NULL);
04837 
04838                 iops = &lfsck->li_obj_oit->do_index_ops->dio_it;
04839 
04840                 /* The low layer otable-based iteration position may NOT
04841                  * exactly match the layout-based directory traversal
04842                  * cookie. Generally, it is not a serious issue. But the
04843                  * caller should NOT make assumption on that. */
04844                 pos = iops->store(env, lfsck->li_di_oit);
04845                 if (!lfsck->li_current_oit_processed)
04846                         pos--;
04847                 seq_printf(m, "current_position: "LPU64"\n", pos);
04848 
04849         } else if (lo->ll_status == LS_SCANNING_PHASE2) {
04850                 cfs_duration_t duration = cfs_time_current() -
04851                                           com->lc_time_last_checkpoint;
04852                 __u64 checked = lo->ll_objs_checked_phase2 +
04853                                 com->lc_new_checked;
04854                 __u64 speed1 = lo->ll_objs_checked_phase1;
04855                 __u64 speed2 = checked;
04856                 __u64 new_checked = com->lc_new_checked *
04857                                     msecs_to_jiffies(MSEC_PER_SEC);
04858                 __u32 rtime = lo->ll_run_time_phase2 +
04859                               cfs_duration_sec(duration + HALF_SEC);
04860 
04861                 if (duration != 0)
04862                         do_div(new_checked, duration);
04863                 if (lo->ll_run_time_phase1 != 0)
04864                         do_div(speed1, lo->ll_run_time_phase1);
04865                 if (rtime != 0)
04866                         do_div(speed2, rtime);
04867                 seq_printf(m, "checked_phase1: "LPU64"\n"
04868                            "checked_phase2: "LPU64"\n"
04869                            "run_time_phase1: %u seconds\n"
04870                            "run_time_phase2: %u seconds\n"
04871                            "average_speed_phase1: "LPU64" items/sec\n"
04872                            "average_speed_phase2: "LPU64" items/sec\n"
04873                            "real-time_speed_phase1: N/A\n"
04874                            "real-time_speed_phase2: "LPU64" items/sec\n"
04875                            "current_position: "DFID"\n",
04876                            lo->ll_objs_checked_phase1,
04877                            checked,
04878                            lo->ll_run_time_phase1,
04879                            rtime,
04880                            speed1,
04881                            speed2,
04882                            new_checked,
04883                            PFID(&com->lc_fid_latest_scanned_phase2));
04884         } else {
04885                 __u64 speed1 = lo->ll_objs_checked_phase1;
04886                 __u64 speed2 = lo->ll_objs_checked_phase2;
04887 
04888                 if (lo->ll_run_time_phase1 != 0)
04889                         do_div(speed1, lo->ll_run_time_phase1);
04890                 if (lo->ll_run_time_phase2 != 0)
04891                         do_div(speed2, lo->ll_run_time_phase2);
04892                 seq_printf(m, "checked_phase1: "LPU64"\n"
04893                            "checked_phase2: "LPU64"\n"
04894                            "run_time_phase1: %u seconds\n"
04895                            "run_time_phase2: %u seconds\n"
04896                            "average_speed_phase1: "LPU64" items/sec\n"
04897                            "average_speed_phase2: "LPU64" objs/sec\n"
04898                            "real-time_speed_phase1: N/A\n"
04899                            "real-time_speed_phase2: N/A\n"
04900                            "current_position: N/A\n",
04901                            lo->ll_objs_checked_phase1,
04902                            lo->ll_objs_checked_phase2,
04903                            lo->ll_run_time_phase1,
04904                            lo->ll_run_time_phase2,
04905                            speed1,
04906                            speed2);
04907         }
04908 
04909         up_read(&com->lc_sem);
04910 }
04911 
04912 static int lfsck_layout_master_double_scan(const struct lu_env *env,
04913                                            struct lfsck_component *com)
04914 {
04915         struct lfsck_layout             *lo     = com->lc_file_ram;
04916         struct lfsck_assistant_data     *lad    = com->lc_data;
04917         struct lfsck_instance           *lfsck  = com->lc_lfsck;
04918         struct lfsck_tgt_descs          *ltds;
04919         struct lfsck_tgt_desc           *ltd;
04920         struct lfsck_tgt_desc           *next;
04921         int                              rc;
04922 
04923         rc = lfsck_double_scan_generic(env, com, lo->ll_status);
04924 
04925         if (thread_is_stopped(&lad->lad_thread)) {
04926                 LASSERT(list_empty(&lad->lad_req_list));
04927                 LASSERT(list_empty(&lad->lad_ost_phase1_list));
04928                 LASSERT(list_empty(&lad->lad_mdt_phase1_list));
04929 
04930                 ltds = &lfsck->li_ost_descs;
04931                 spin_lock(&ltds->ltd_lock);
04932                 list_for_each_entry_safe(ltd, next, &lad->lad_ost_phase2_list,
04933                                          ltd_layout_phase_list) {
04934                         list_del_init(&ltd->ltd_layout_phase_list);
04935                 }
04936                 spin_unlock(&ltds->ltd_lock);
04937 
04938                 ltds = &lfsck->li_mdt_descs;
04939                 spin_lock(&ltds->ltd_lock);
04940                 list_for_each_entry_safe(ltd, next, &lad->lad_mdt_phase2_list,
04941                                          ltd_layout_phase_list) {
04942                         list_del_init(&ltd->ltd_layout_phase_list);
04943                 }
04944                 spin_unlock(&ltds->ltd_lock);
04945         }
04946 
04947         return rc;
04948 }
04949 
04950 static int lfsck_layout_slave_double_scan(const struct lu_env *env,
04951                                           struct lfsck_component *com)
04952 {
04953         struct lfsck_instance           *lfsck  = com->lc_lfsck;
04954         struct lfsck_layout_slave_data  *llsd   = com->lc_data;
04955         struct lfsck_layout             *lo     = com->lc_file_ram;
04956         struct ptlrpc_thread            *thread = &lfsck->li_thread;
04957         int                              rc;
04958         ENTRY;
04959 
04960         CDEBUG(D_LFSCK, "%s: layout LFSCK slave phase2 scan start\n",
04961                lfsck_lfsck2name(lfsck));
04962 
04963         atomic_inc(&lfsck->li_double_scan_count);
04964 
04965         if (lo->ll_flags & LF_INCOMPLETE)
04966                 GOTO(done, rc = 1);
04967 
04968         com->lc_new_checked = 0;
04969         com->lc_new_scanned = 0;
04970         com->lc_time_last_checkpoint = cfs_time_current();
04971         com->lc_time_next_checkpoint = com->lc_time_last_checkpoint +
04972                                 cfs_time_seconds(LFSCK_CHECKPOINT_INTERVAL);
04973 
04974         while (1) {
04975                 struct l_wait_info lwi = LWI_TIMEOUT(cfs_time_seconds(30),
04976                                                      NULL, NULL);
04977 
04978                 rc = lfsck_layout_slave_query_master(env, com);
04979                 if (list_empty(&llsd->llsd_master_list)) {
04980                         if (unlikely(!thread_is_running(thread)))
04981                                 rc = 0;
04982                         else
04983                                 rc = 1;
04984 
04985                         GOTO(done, rc);
04986                 }
04987 
04988                 if (rc < 0)
04989                         GOTO(done, rc);
04990 
04991                 rc = l_wait_event(thread->t_ctl_waitq,
04992                                   !thread_is_running(thread) ||
04993                                   lo->ll_flags & LF_INCOMPLETE ||
04994                                   list_empty(&llsd->llsd_master_list),
04995                                   &lwi);
04996                 if (unlikely(!thread_is_running(thread)))
04997                         GOTO(done, rc = 0);
04998 
04999                 if (lo->ll_flags & LF_INCOMPLETE)
05000                         GOTO(done, rc = 1);
05001 
05002                 if (rc == -ETIMEDOUT)
05003                         continue;
05004 
05005                 GOTO(done, rc = (rc < 0 ? rc : 1));
05006         }
05007 
05008 done:
05009         rc = lfsck_layout_double_scan_result(env, com, rc);
05010         lfsck_layout_slave_notify_master(env, com, LE_PHASE2_DONE,
05011                         (rc > 0 && lo->ll_flags & LF_INCOMPLETE) ? 0 : rc);
05012         lfsck_layout_slave_quit(env, com);
05013         if (atomic_dec_and_test(&lfsck->li_double_scan_count))
05014                 wake_up_all(&lfsck->li_thread.t_ctl_waitq);
05015 
05016         CDEBUG(D_LFSCK, "%s: layout LFSCK slave phase2 scan finished, "
05017                "status %d: rc = %d\n",
05018                lfsck_lfsck2name(lfsck), lo->ll_status, rc);
05019 
05020         return rc;
05021 }
05022 
05023 static void lfsck_layout_master_data_release(const struct lu_env *env,
05024                                              struct lfsck_component *com)
05025 {
05026         struct lfsck_assistant_data     *lad    = com->lc_data;
05027         struct lfsck_instance           *lfsck  = com->lc_lfsck;
05028         struct lfsck_tgt_descs          *ltds;
05029         struct lfsck_tgt_desc           *ltd;
05030         struct lfsck_tgt_desc           *next;
05031 
05032         LASSERT(lad != NULL);
05033         LASSERT(thread_is_init(&lad->lad_thread) ||
05034                 thread_is_stopped(&lad->lad_thread));
05035         LASSERT(list_empty(&lad->lad_req_list));
05036 
05037         com->lc_data = NULL;
05038 
05039         ltds = &lfsck->li_ost_descs;
05040         spin_lock(&ltds->ltd_lock);
05041         list_for_each_entry_safe(ltd, next, &lad->lad_ost_phase1_list,
05042                                  ltd_layout_phase_list) {
05043                 list_del_init(&ltd->ltd_layout_phase_list);
05044         }
05045         list_for_each_entry_safe(ltd, next, &lad->lad_ost_phase2_list,
05046                                  ltd_layout_phase_list) {
05047                 list_del_init(&ltd->ltd_layout_phase_list);
05048         }
05049         list_for_each_entry_safe(ltd, next, &lad->lad_ost_list,
05050                                  ltd_layout_list) {
05051                 list_del_init(&ltd->ltd_layout_list);
05052         }
05053         spin_unlock(&ltds->ltd_lock);
05054 
05055         ltds = &lfsck->li_mdt_descs;
05056         spin_lock(&ltds->ltd_lock);
05057         list_for_each_entry_safe(ltd, next, &lad->lad_mdt_phase1_list,
05058                                  ltd_layout_phase_list) {
05059                 list_del_init(&ltd->ltd_layout_phase_list);
05060         }
05061         list_for_each_entry_safe(ltd, next, &lad->lad_mdt_phase2_list,
05062                                  ltd_layout_phase_list) {
05063                 list_del_init(&ltd->ltd_layout_phase_list);
05064         }
05065         list_for_each_entry_safe(ltd, next, &lad->lad_mdt_list,
05066                                  ltd_layout_list) {
05067                 list_del_init(&ltd->ltd_layout_list);
05068         }
05069         spin_unlock(&ltds->ltd_lock);
05070 
05071         if (likely(lad->lad_bitmap != NULL))
05072                 CFS_FREE_BITMAP(lad->lad_bitmap);
05073 
05074         OBD_FREE_PTR(lad);
05075 }
05076 
05077 static void lfsck_layout_slave_data_release(const struct lu_env *env,
05078                                             struct lfsck_component *com)
05079 {
05080         struct lfsck_layout_slave_data *llsd = com->lc_data;
05081 
05082         lfsck_layout_slave_quit(env, com);
05083         com->lc_data = NULL;
05084         OBD_FREE_PTR(llsd);
05085 }
05086 
05087 static void lfsck_layout_master_quit(const struct lu_env *env,
05088                                      struct lfsck_component *com)
05089 {
05090         struct lfsck_assistant_data     *lad    = com->lc_data;
05091         struct lfsck_instance           *lfsck  = com->lc_lfsck;
05092         struct lfsck_tgt_descs          *ltds;
05093         struct lfsck_tgt_desc           *ltd;
05094         struct lfsck_tgt_desc           *next;
05095 
05096         LASSERT(lad != NULL);
05097 
05098         lfsck_quit_generic(env, com);
05099 
05100         LASSERT(thread_is_init(&lad->lad_thread) ||
05101                 thread_is_stopped(&lad->lad_thread));
05102         LASSERT(list_empty(&lad->lad_req_list));
05103 
05104         ltds = &lfsck->li_ost_descs;
05105         spin_lock(&ltds->ltd_lock);
05106         list_for_each_entry_safe(ltd, next, &lad->lad_ost_phase1_list,
05107                                  ltd_layout_phase_list) {
05108                 list_del_init(&ltd->ltd_layout_phase_list);
05109         }
05110         list_for_each_entry_safe(ltd, next, &lad->lad_ost_phase2_list,
05111                                  ltd_layout_phase_list) {
05112                 list_del_init(&ltd->ltd_layout_phase_list);
05113         }
05114         spin_unlock(&ltds->ltd_lock);
05115 
05116         ltds = &lfsck->li_mdt_descs;
05117         spin_lock(&ltds->ltd_lock);
05118         list_for_each_entry_safe(ltd, next, &lad->lad_mdt_phase1_list,
05119                                  ltd_layout_phase_list) {
05120                 list_del_init(&ltd->ltd_layout_phase_list);
05121         }
05122         list_for_each_entry_safe(ltd, next, &lad->lad_mdt_phase2_list,
05123                                  ltd_layout_phase_list) {
05124                 list_del_init(&ltd->ltd_layout_phase_list);
05125         }
05126         spin_unlock(&ltds->ltd_lock);
05127 }
05128 
05129 static void lfsck_layout_slave_quit(const struct lu_env *env,
05130                                     struct lfsck_component *com)
05131 {
05132         struct lfsck_layout_slave_data   *llsd  = com->lc_data;
05133         struct lfsck_layout_seq          *lls;
05134         struct lfsck_layout_seq          *next;
05135         struct lfsck_layout_slave_target *llst;
05136 
05137         LASSERT(llsd != NULL);
05138 
05139         down_write(&com->lc_sem);
05140         list_for_each_entry_safe(lls, next, &llsd->llsd_seq_list,
05141                                  lls_list) {
05142                 list_del_init(&lls->lls_list);
05143                 lfsck_object_put(env, lls->lls_lastid_obj);
05144                 OBD_FREE_PTR(lls);
05145         }
05146         up_write(&com->lc_sem);
05147 
05148         spin_lock(&llsd->llsd_lock);
05149         while (!list_empty(&llsd->llsd_master_list)) {
05150                 llst = list_entry(llsd->llsd_master_list.next,
05151                                   struct lfsck_layout_slave_target, llst_list);
05152                 list_del_init(&llst->llst_list);
05153                 spin_unlock(&llsd->llsd_lock);
05154                 lfsck_layout_llst_put(llst);
05155                 spin_lock(&llsd->llsd_lock);
05156         }
05157         spin_unlock(&llsd->llsd_lock);
05158 
05159         lfsck_rbtree_cleanup(env, com);
05160 }
05161 
05162 static int lfsck_layout_master_in_notify(const struct lu_env *env,
05163                                          struct lfsck_component *com,
05164                                          struct lfsck_request *lr,
05165                                          struct thandle *th)
05166 {
05167         struct lfsck_instance           *lfsck = com->lc_lfsck;
05168         struct lfsck_layout             *lo    = com->lc_file_ram;
05169         struct lfsck_assistant_data     *lad   = com->lc_data;
05170         struct lfsck_tgt_descs          *ltds;
05171         struct lfsck_tgt_desc           *ltd;
05172         bool                             fail  = false;
05173         ENTRY;
05174 
05175         if (lr->lr_event == LE_PAIRS_VERIFY) {
05176                 int rc;
05177 
05178                 rc = lfsck_layout_master_check_pairs(env, com, &lr->lr_fid,
05179                                                      &lr->lr_fid2);
05180 
05181                 RETURN(rc);
05182         }
05183 
05184         CDEBUG(D_LFSCK, "%s: layout LFSCK master handles notify %u "
05185                "from %s %x, status %d, flags %x, flags2 %x\n",
05186                lfsck_lfsck2name(lfsck), lr->lr_event,
05187                (lr->lr_flags & LEF_FROM_OST) ? "OST" : "MDT",
05188                lr->lr_index, lr->lr_status, lr->lr_flags, lr->lr_flags2);
05189 
05190         if (lr->lr_event != LE_PHASE1_DONE &&
05191             lr->lr_event != LE_PHASE2_DONE &&
05192             lr->lr_event != LE_PEER_EXIT)
05193                 RETURN(-EINVAL);
05194 
05195         if (lr->lr_flags & LEF_FROM_OST)
05196                 ltds = &lfsck->li_ost_descs;
05197         else
05198                 ltds = &lfsck->li_mdt_descs;
05199         spin_lock(&ltds->ltd_lock);
05200         ltd = lfsck_ltd2tgt(ltds, lr->lr_index);
05201         if (ltd == NULL) {
05202                 spin_unlock(&ltds->ltd_lock);
05203 
05204                 RETURN(-ENXIO);
05205         }
05206 
05207         list_del_init(&ltd->ltd_layout_phase_list);
05208         switch (lr->lr_event) {
05209         case LE_PHASE1_DONE:
05210                 if (lr->lr_status <= 0 || lr->lr_flags2 & LF_INCOMPLETE) {
05211                         if (lr->lr_flags2 & LF_INCOMPLETE) {
05212                                 if (lr->lr_flags & LEF_FROM_OST)
05213                                         lfsck_lad_set_bitmap(env, com,
05214                                                              ltd->ltd_index);
05215                                 else
05216                                         lo->ll_flags |= LF_INCOMPLETE;
05217                         }
05218                         ltd->ltd_layout_done = 1;
05219                         list_del_init(&ltd->ltd_layout_list);
05220                         fail = true;
05221                         break;
05222                 }
05223 
05224                 if (lr->lr_flags & LEF_FROM_OST) {
05225                         if (list_empty(&ltd->ltd_layout_list))
05226                                 list_add_tail(&ltd->ltd_layout_list,
05227                                               &lad->lad_ost_list);
05228                         list_add_tail(&ltd->ltd_layout_phase_list,
05229                                       &lad->lad_ost_phase2_list);
05230                 } else {
05231                         if (list_empty(&ltd->ltd_layout_list))
05232                                 list_add_tail(&ltd->ltd_layout_list,
05233                                               &lad->lad_mdt_list);
05234                         list_add_tail(&ltd->ltd_layout_phase_list,
05235                                       &lad->lad_mdt_phase2_list);
05236                 }
05237                 break;
05238         case LE_PHASE2_DONE:
05239                 ltd->ltd_layout_done = 1;
05240                 if (!list_empty(&ltd->ltd_layout_list)) {
05241                         list_del_init(&ltd->ltd_layout_list);
05242                         if (lr->lr_flags2 & LF_INCOMPLETE) {
05243                                 lfsck_lad_set_bitmap(env, com, ltd->ltd_index);
05244                                 fail = true;
05245                         }
05246                 }
05247 
05248                 break;
05249         case LE_PEER_EXIT:
05250                 fail = true;
05251                 ltd->ltd_layout_done = 1;
05252                 list_del_init(&ltd->ltd_layout_list);
05253                 if (!(lfsck->li_bookmark_ram.lb_param & LPF_FAILOUT) &&
05254                     !(lr->lr_flags & LEF_FROM_OST))
05255                                 lo->ll_flags |= LF_INCOMPLETE;
05256                 break;
05257         default:
05258                 break;
05259         }
05260         spin_unlock(&ltds->ltd_lock);
05261 
05262         if (fail && lfsck->li_bookmark_ram.lb_param & LPF_FAILOUT) {
05263                 struct lfsck_stop *stop = &lfsck_env_info(env)->lti_stop;
05264 
05265                 memset(stop, 0, sizeof(*stop));
05266                 stop->ls_status = lr->lr_status;
05267                 stop->ls_flags = lr->lr_param & ~LPF_BROADCAST;
05268                 lfsck_stop(env, lfsck->li_bottom, stop);
05269         } else if (lfsck_phase2_next_ready(lad)) {
05270                 wake_up_all(&lad->lad_thread.t_ctl_waitq);
05271         }
05272 
05273         RETURN(0);
05274 }
05275 
05276 static int lfsck_layout_slave_in_notify(const struct lu_env *env,
05277                                         struct lfsck_component *com,
05278                                         struct lfsck_request *lr,
05279                                         struct thandle *th)
05280 {
05281         struct lfsck_instance            *lfsck = com->lc_lfsck;
05282         struct lfsck_layout_slave_data   *llsd  = com->lc_data;
05283         struct lfsck_layout_slave_target *llst;
05284         int                               rc;
05285         ENTRY;
05286 
05287         switch (lr->lr_event) {
05288         case LE_FID_ACCESSED:
05289                 lfsck_rbtree_update_bitmap(env, com, &lr->lr_fid, true);
05290                 RETURN(0);
05291         case LE_CONDITIONAL_DESTROY:
05292                 rc = lfsck_layout_slave_conditional_destroy(env, com, lr);
05293                 RETURN(rc);
05294         case LE_PAIRS_VERIFY: {
05295                 lr->lr_status = LPVS_INIT;
05296                 /* Firstly, if the MDT-object which is claimed via OST-object
05297                  * local stored PFID xattr recognizes the OST-object, then it
05298                  * must be that the client given PFID is wrong. */
05299                 rc = lfsck_layout_slave_check_pairs(env, com, &lr->lr_fid,
05300                                                     &lr->lr_fid3);
05301                 if (rc <= 0)
05302                         RETURN(0);
05303 
05304                 lr->lr_status = LPVS_INCONSISTENT;
05305                 /* The OST-object local stored PFID xattr is stale. We need to
05306                  * check whether the MDT-object that is claimed via the client
05307                  * given PFID information recognizes the OST-object or not. If
05308                  * matches, then need to update the OST-object's PFID xattr. */
05309                 rc = lfsck_layout_slave_check_pairs(env, com, &lr->lr_fid,
05310                                                     &lr->lr_fid2);
05311                 /* For rc < 0 case:
05312                  * We are not sure whether the client given PFID information
05313                  * is correct or not, do nothing to avoid improper fixing.
05314                  *
05315                  * For rc > 0 case:
05316                  * The client given PFID information is also invalid, we can
05317                  * NOT fix the OST-object inconsistency.
05318                  */
05319                 if (rc != 0)
05320                         RETURN(rc);
05321 
05322                 lr->lr_status = LPVS_INCONSISTENT_TOFIX;
05323                 rc = lfsck_layout_slave_repair_pfid(env, com, lr);
05324 
05325                 RETURN(rc);
05326         }
05327         case LE_PHASE1_DONE: {
05328                 if (lr->lr_flags2 & LF_INCOMPLETE) {
05329                         struct lfsck_layout *lo = com->lc_file_ram;
05330 
05331                         lo->ll_flags |= LF_INCOMPLETE;
05332                         llst = lfsck_layout_llst_find_and_del(llsd,
05333                                                               lr->lr_index,
05334                                                               true);
05335                         if (llst != NULL) {
05336                                 lfsck_layout_llst_put(llst);
05337                                 wake_up_all(&lfsck->li_thread.t_ctl_waitq);
05338                         }
05339                 }
05340 
05341                 RETURN(0);
05342         }
05343         case LE_PHASE2_DONE:
05344         case LE_PEER_EXIT:
05345                 CDEBUG(D_LFSCK, "%s: layout LFSCK slave handle notify %u "
05346                        "from MDT %x, status %d\n", lfsck_lfsck2name(lfsck),
05347                        lr->lr_event, lr->lr_index, lr->lr_status);
05348                 break;
05349         default:
05350                 RETURN(-EINVAL);
05351         }
05352 
05353         llst = lfsck_layout_llst_find_and_del(llsd, lr->lr_index, true);
05354         if (llst == NULL)
05355                 RETURN(0);
05356 
05357         lfsck_layout_llst_put(llst);
05358         if (list_empty(&llsd->llsd_master_list))
05359                 wake_up_all(&lfsck->li_thread.t_ctl_waitq);
05360 
05361         if (lr->lr_event == LE_PEER_EXIT &&
05362             (lfsck->li_bookmark_ram.lb_param & LPF_FAILOUT ||
05363              (list_empty(&llsd->llsd_master_list) &&
05364               (lr->lr_status == LS_STOPPED ||
05365                lr->lr_status == LS_CO_STOPPED)))) {
05366                 struct lfsck_stop *stop = &lfsck_env_info(env)->lti_stop;
05367 
05368                 memset(stop, 0, sizeof(*stop));
05369                 stop->ls_status = lr->lr_status;
05370                 stop->ls_flags = lr->lr_param & ~LPF_BROADCAST;
05371                 lfsck_stop(env, lfsck->li_bottom, stop);
05372         }
05373 
05374         RETURN(0);
05375 }
05376 
05377 static void lfsck_layout_repaired(struct lfsck_layout *lo, __u64 *count)
05378 {
05379         int i;
05380 
05381         for (i = 0; i < LLIT_MAX; i++)
05382                 *count += lo->ll_objs_repaired[i];
05383 }
05384 
05385 static int lfsck_layout_query_all(const struct lu_env *env,
05386                                   struct lfsck_component *com,
05387                                   __u32 *mdts_count, __u32 *osts_count,
05388                                   __u64 *repaired)
05389 {
05390         struct lfsck_layout *lo = com->lc_file_ram;
05391         struct lfsck_tgt_descs *ltds;
05392         struct lfsck_tgt_desc *ltd;
05393         int idx;
05394         int rc;
05395         ENTRY;
05396 
05397         rc = lfsck_query_all(env, com);
05398         if (rc != 0)
05399                 RETURN(rc);
05400 
05401         ltds = &com->lc_lfsck->li_mdt_descs;
05402         down_read(&ltds->ltd_rw_sem);
05403         cfs_foreach_bit(ltds->ltd_tgts_bitmap, idx) {
05404                 ltd = lfsck_ltd2tgt(ltds, idx);
05405                 LASSERT(ltd != NULL);
05406 
05407                 mdts_count[ltd->ltd_layout_status]++;
05408                 *repaired += ltd->ltd_layout_repaired;
05409         }
05410         up_read(&ltds->ltd_rw_sem);
05411 
05412         ltds = &com->lc_lfsck->li_ost_descs;
05413         down_read(&ltds->ltd_rw_sem);
05414         cfs_foreach_bit(ltds->ltd_tgts_bitmap, idx) {
05415                 ltd = lfsck_ltd2tgt(ltds, idx);
05416                 LASSERT(ltd != NULL);
05417 
05418                 osts_count[ltd->ltd_layout_status]++;
05419                 *repaired += ltd->ltd_layout_repaired;
05420         }
05421         up_read(&ltds->ltd_rw_sem);
05422 
05423         down_read(&com->lc_sem);
05424         mdts_count[lo->ll_status]++;
05425         lfsck_layout_repaired(lo, repaired);
05426         up_read(&com->lc_sem);
05427 
05428         RETURN(0);
05429 }
05430 
05431 static int lfsck_layout_query(const struct lu_env *env,
05432                               struct lfsck_component *com,
05433                               struct lfsck_request *req,
05434                               struct lfsck_reply *rep,
05435                               struct lfsck_query *que, int idx)
05436 {
05437         struct lfsck_layout *lo = com->lc_file_ram;
05438         int rc = 0;
05439 
05440         if (que != NULL) {
05441                 LASSERT(com->lc_lfsck->li_master);
05442 
05443                 rc = lfsck_layout_query_all(env, com,
05444                                             que->lu_mdts_count[idx],
05445                                             que->lu_osts_count[idx],
05446                                             &que->lu_repaired[idx]);
05447         } else {
05448                 down_read(&com->lc_sem);
05449                 rep->lr_status = lo->ll_status;
05450                 if (req->lr_flags & LEF_QUERY_ALL)
05451                         lfsck_layout_repaired(lo, &rep->lr_repaired);
05452                 up_read(&com->lc_sem);
05453         }
05454 
05455         return rc;
05456 }
05457 
05458 /* with lfsck::li_lock held */
05459 static int lfsck_layout_slave_join(const struct lu_env *env,
05460                                    struct lfsck_component *com,
05461                                    struct lfsck_start_param *lsp)
05462 {
05463         struct lfsck_instance            *lfsck = com->lc_lfsck;
05464         struct lfsck_layout_slave_data   *llsd  = com->lc_data;
05465         struct lfsck_layout_slave_target *llst;
05466         struct lfsck_start               *start = lsp->lsp_start;
05467         int                               rc    = 0;
05468         ENTRY;
05469 
05470         if (start == NULL || !(start->ls_flags & LPF_OST_ORPHAN))
05471                 RETURN(0);
05472 
05473         if (!lsp->lsp_index_valid)
05474                 RETURN(-EINVAL);
05475 
05476         /* If someone is running the LFSCK without orphan handling,
05477          * it will not maintain the object accessing rbtree. So we
05478          * cannot join it for orphan handling. */
05479         if (!llsd->llsd_rbtree_valid)
05480                 RETURN(-EBUSY);
05481 
05482         spin_unlock(&lfsck->li_lock);
05483         rc = lfsck_layout_llst_add(llsd, lsp->lsp_index);
05484         spin_lock(&lfsck->li_lock);
05485         if (rc == 0 && !thread_is_running(&lfsck->li_thread)) {
05486                 spin_unlock(&lfsck->li_lock);
05487                 llst = lfsck_layout_llst_find_and_del(llsd, lsp->lsp_index,
05488                                                       true);
05489                 if (llst != NULL)
05490                         lfsck_layout_llst_put(llst);
05491                 spin_lock(&lfsck->li_lock);
05492                 rc = -EAGAIN;
05493         }
05494 
05495         RETURN(rc);
05496 }
05497 
05498 static struct lfsck_operations lfsck_layout_master_ops = {
05499         .lfsck_reset            = lfsck_layout_reset,
05500         .lfsck_fail             = lfsck_layout_fail,
05501         .lfsck_checkpoint       = lfsck_layout_master_checkpoint,
05502         .lfsck_prep             = lfsck_layout_master_prep,
05503         .lfsck_exec_oit         = lfsck_layout_master_exec_oit,
05504         .lfsck_exec_dir         = lfsck_layout_exec_dir,
05505         .lfsck_post             = lfsck_layout_master_post,
05506         .lfsck_dump             = lfsck_layout_dump,
05507         .lfsck_double_scan      = lfsck_layout_master_double_scan,
05508         .lfsck_data_release     = lfsck_layout_master_data_release,
05509         .lfsck_quit             = lfsck_layout_master_quit,
05510         .lfsck_in_notify        = lfsck_layout_master_in_notify,
05511         .lfsck_query            = lfsck_layout_query,
05512 };
05513 
05514 static struct lfsck_operations lfsck_layout_slave_ops = {
05515         .lfsck_reset            = lfsck_layout_reset,
05516         .lfsck_fail             = lfsck_layout_fail,
05517         .lfsck_checkpoint       = lfsck_layout_slave_checkpoint,
05518         .lfsck_prep             = lfsck_layout_slave_prep,
05519         .lfsck_exec_oit         = lfsck_layout_slave_exec_oit,
05520         .lfsck_exec_dir         = lfsck_layout_exec_dir,
05521         .lfsck_post             = lfsck_layout_slave_post,
05522         .lfsck_dump             = lfsck_layout_dump,
05523         .lfsck_double_scan      = lfsck_layout_slave_double_scan,
05524         .lfsck_data_release     = lfsck_layout_slave_data_release,
05525         .lfsck_quit             = lfsck_layout_slave_quit,
05526         .lfsck_in_notify        = lfsck_layout_slave_in_notify,
05527         .lfsck_query            = lfsck_layout_query,
05528         .lfsck_join             = lfsck_layout_slave_join,
05529 };
05530 
05531 static void lfsck_layout_assistant_fill_pos(const struct lu_env *env,
05532                                             struct lfsck_component *com,
05533                                             struct lfsck_position *pos)
05534 {
05535         struct lfsck_assistant_data     *lad = com->lc_data;
05536         struct lfsck_layout_req         *llr;
05537 
05538         if (list_empty(&lad->lad_req_list))
05539                 return;
05540 
05541         llr = list_entry(lad->lad_req_list.next,
05542                          struct lfsck_layout_req,
05543                          llr_lar.lar_list);
05544         pos->lp_oit_cookie = llr->llr_lar.lar_parent->lso_oit_cookie - 1;
05545 }
05546 
05547 struct lfsck_assistant_operations lfsck_layout_assistant_ops = {
05548         .la_handler_p1          = lfsck_layout_assistant_handler_p1,
05549         .la_handler_p2          = lfsck_layout_assistant_handler_p2,
05550         .la_fill_pos            = lfsck_layout_assistant_fill_pos,
05551         .la_double_scan_result  = lfsck_layout_double_scan_result,
05552         .la_req_fini            = lfsck_layout_assistant_req_fini,
05553         .la_sync_failures       = lfsck_layout_assistant_sync_failures,
05554 };
05555 
05556 int lfsck_layout_setup(const struct lu_env *env, struct lfsck_instance *lfsck)
05557 {
05558         struct lfsck_component  *com;
05559         struct lfsck_layout     *lo;
05560         struct dt_object        *root = NULL;
05561         struct dt_object        *obj;
05562         int                      rc;
05563         ENTRY;
05564 
05565         OBD_ALLOC_PTR(com);
05566         if (com == NULL)
05567                 RETURN(-ENOMEM);
05568 
05569         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&com->lc_link);
05570         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&com->lc_link_dir);
05571         init_rwsem(&com->lc_sem);
05572         atomic_set(&com->lc_ref, 1);
05573         com->lc_lfsck = lfsck;
05574         com->lc_type = LFSCK_TYPE_LAYOUT;
05575         if (lfsck->li_master) {
05576                 com->lc_ops = &lfsck_layout_master_ops;
05577                 com->lc_data = lfsck_assistant_data_init(
05578                                 &lfsck_layout_assistant_ops,
05579                                 LFSCK_LAYOUT);
05580                 if (com->lc_data == NULL)
05581                         GOTO(out, rc = -ENOMEM);
05582         } else {
05583                 struct lfsck_layout_slave_data *llsd;
05584 
05585                 com->lc_ops = &lfsck_layout_slave_ops;
05586                 OBD_ALLOC_PTR(llsd);
05587                 if (llsd == NULL)
05588                         GOTO(out, rc = -ENOMEM);
05589 
05590                 INIT_LIST_HEAD(&llsd->llsd_seq_list);
05591                 INIT_LIST_HEAD(&llsd->llsd_master_list);
05592                 spin_lock_init(&llsd->llsd_lock);
05593                 llsd->llsd_rb_root = RB_ROOT;
05594                 rwlock_init(&llsd->llsd_rb_lock);
05595                 com->lc_data = llsd;
05596         }
05597         com->lc_file_size = sizeof(*lo);
05598         OBD_ALLOC(com->lc_file_ram, com->lc_file_size);
05599         if (com->lc_file_ram == NULL)
05600                 GOTO(out, rc = -ENOMEM);
05601 
05602         OBD_ALLOC(com->lc_file_disk, com->lc_file_size);
05603         if (com->lc_file_disk == NULL)
05604                 GOTO(out, rc = -ENOMEM);
05605 
05606         root = dt_locate(env, lfsck->li_bottom, &lfsck->li_local_root_fid);
05607         if (IS_ERR(root))
05608                 GOTO(out, rc = PTR_ERR(root));
05609 
05610         if (unlikely(!dt_try_as_dir(env, root)))
05611                 GOTO(out, rc = -ENOTDIR);
05612 
05613         obj = local_file_find_or_create(env, lfsck->li_los, root,
05614                                         LFSCK_LAYOUT,
05615                                         S_IFREG | S_IRUGO | S_IWUSR);
05616         if (IS_ERR(obj))
05617                 GOTO(out, rc = PTR_ERR(obj));
05618 
05619         com->lc_obj = obj;
05620         rc = lfsck_layout_load(env, com);
05621         if (rc > 0)
05622                 rc = lfsck_layout_reset(env, com, true);
05623         else if (rc == -ENOENT)
05624                 rc = lfsck_layout_init(env, com);
05625 
05626         if (rc != 0)
05627                 GOTO(out, rc);
05628 
05629         lo = com->lc_file_ram;
05630         switch (lo->ll_status) {
05631         case LS_INIT:
05632         case LS_COMPLETED:
05633         case LS_FAILED:
05634         case LS_STOPPED:
05635         case LS_PARTIAL:
05636                 spin_lock(&lfsck->li_lock);
05637                 list_add_tail(&com->lc_link, &lfsck->li_list_idle);
05638                 spin_unlock(&lfsck->li_lock);
05639                 break;
