05640         default:
05641                 CERROR("%s: unknown lfsck_layout status %d\n",
05642                        lfsck_lfsck2name(lfsck), lo->ll_status);
05643                 /* fall through */
05644         case LS_SCANNING_PHASE1:
05645         case LS_SCANNING_PHASE2:
05646                 /* No need to store the status to disk right now.
05647                  * If the system crashed before the status stored,
05648                  * it will be loaded back when next time. */
05649                 lo->ll_status = LS_CRASHED;
05650                 if (!lfsck->li_master)
05651                         lo->ll_flags |= LF_INCOMPLETE;
05652                 /* fall through */
05653         case LS_PAUSED:
05654         case LS_CRASHED:
05655         case LS_CO_FAILED:
05656         case LS_CO_STOPPED:
05657         case LS_CO_PAUSED:
05658                 spin_lock(&lfsck->li_lock);
05659                 list_add_tail(&com->lc_link, &lfsck->li_list_scan);
05660                 spin_unlock(&lfsck->li_lock);
05661                 break;
05662         }
05663 
05664         if (lo->ll_flags & LF_CRASHED_LASTID) {
05665                 LASSERT(lfsck->li_out_notify != NULL);
05666 
05667                 lfsck->li_out_notify(env, lfsck->li_out_notify_data,
05668                                      LE_LASTID_REBUILDING);
05669         }
05670 
05671         GOTO(out, rc = 0);
05672 
05673 out:
05674         if (root != NULL && !IS_ERR(root))
05675                 lfsck_object_put(env, root);
05676 
05677         if (rc != 0) {
05678                 lfsck_component_cleanup(env, com);
05679                 CERROR("%s: fail to init layout LFSCK component: rc = %d\n",
05680                        lfsck_lfsck2name(lfsck), rc);
05681         }
05682 
05683         return rc;
05684 }
05685 
05686 struct lfsck_orphan_it {
05687         struct lfsck_component           *loi_com;
05688         struct lfsck_rbtree_node         *loi_lrn;
05689         struct lfsck_layout_slave_target *loi_llst;
05690         struct lu_fid                     loi_key;
05691         struct lu_orphan_rec              loi_rec;
05692         __u64                             loi_hash;
05693         unsigned int                      loi_over:1;
05694 };
05695 
05696 static int lfsck_fid_match_idx(const struct lu_env *env,
05697                                struct lfsck_instance *lfsck,
05698                                const struct lu_fid *fid, int idx)
05699 {
05700         struct seq_server_site  *ss;
05701         struct lu_server_fld    *sf;
05702         struct lu_seq_range     *range = &lfsck_env_info(env)->lti_range;
05703         int                      rc;
05704 
05705         /* All abnormal cases will be returned to MDT0. */
05706         if (!fid_is_norm(fid)) {
05707                 if (idx == 0)
05708                         return 1;
05709 
05710                 return 0;
05711         }
05712 
05713         ss = lfsck_dev_site(lfsck);
05714         if (unlikely(ss == NULL))
05715                 return -ENOTCONN;
05716 
05717         sf = ss->ss_server_fld;
05718         LASSERT(sf != NULL);
05719 
05720         fld_range_set_any(range);
05721         rc = fld_server_lookup(env, sf, fid_seq(fid), range);
05722         if (rc != 0)
05723                 return rc;
05724 
05725         if (!fld_range_is_mdt(range))
05726                 return -EINVAL;
05727 
05728         if (range->lsr_index == idx)
05729                 return 1;
05730 
05731         return 0;
05732 }
05733 
05734 static void lfsck_layout_destroy_orphan(const struct lu_env *env,
05735                                         struct dt_object *obj)
05736 {
05737         struct dt_device        *dev    = lfsck_obj2dev(obj);
05738         struct thandle          *handle;
05739         int                      rc;
05740         ENTRY;
05741 
05742         handle = dt_trans_create(env, dev);
05743         if (IS_ERR(handle))
05744                 RETURN_EXIT;
05745 
05746         rc = dt_declare_ref_del(env, obj, handle);
05747         if (rc != 0)
05748                 GOTO(stop, rc);
05749 
05750         rc = dt_declare_destroy(env, obj, handle);
05751         if (rc != 0)
05752                 GOTO(stop, rc);
05753 
05754         rc = dt_trans_start_local(env, dev, handle);
05755         if (rc != 0)
05756                 GOTO(stop, rc);
05757 
05758         dt_write_lock(env, obj, 0);
05759         rc = dt_ref_del(env, obj, handle);
05760         if (rc == 0)
05761                 rc = dt_destroy(env, obj, handle);
05762         dt_write_unlock(env, obj);
05763 
05764         GOTO(stop, rc);
05765 
05766 stop:
05767         dt_trans_stop(env, dev, handle);
05768 
05769         CDEBUG(D_LFSCK, "destroy orphan OST-object "DFID": rc = %d\n",
05770                PFID(lfsck_dto2fid(obj)), rc);
05771 
05772         RETURN_EXIT;
05773 }
05774 
05775 static int lfsck_orphan_index_lookup(const struct lu_env *env,
05776                                      struct dt_object *dt,
05777                                      struct dt_rec *rec,
05778                                      const struct dt_key *key)
05779 {
05780         return -EOPNOTSUPP;
05781 }

05785                                              const struct dt_rec *rec,

05787                                              struct thandle *handle)

05794                                      const struct dt_rec *rec,

05809

05811                                      struct dt_object *dt,
05812                                      const struct dt_key *key,
05813                                      struct thandle *handle)

05817 
05818 static struct dt_it *lfsck_orphan_it_init(const struct lu_env *env,
05819                                           struct dt_object *dt,
05820                                           __u32 attr)
05821 {
05822         struct dt_device                *dev    = lu2dt_dev(dt->do_lu.lo_dev);
05823         struct lfsck_instance           *lfsck;
05824         struct lfsck_component          *com    = NULL;
05825         struct lfsck_layout_slave_data  *llsd;
05826         struct lfsck_orphan_it          *it     = NULL;
05827         struct lfsck_layout             *lo;
05828         int                              rc     = 0;
05829         ENTRY;
05830 
05831         lfsck = lfsck_instance_find(dev, true, false);
05832         if (unlikely(lfsck == NULL))
05833                 RETURN(ERR_PTR(-ENXIO));
05834 
05835         com = lfsck_component_find(lfsck, LFSCK_TYPE_LAYOUT);
05836         if (unlikely(com == NULL))
05837                 GOTO(out, rc = -ENOENT);
05838 
05839         lo = com->lc_file_ram;
05840         if (lo->ll_flags & LF_INCOMPLETE)
05841                 GOTO(out, rc = -ESRCH);
05842 
05843         llsd = com->lc_data;
05844         if (!llsd->llsd_rbtree_valid)
05845                 GOTO(out, rc = -ESRCH);
05846 
05847         OBD_ALLOC_PTR(it);
05848         if (it == NULL)
05849                 GOTO(out, rc = -ENOMEM);
05850 
05851         it->loi_llst = lfsck_layout_llst_find_and_del(llsd, attr, false);
05852         if (it->loi_llst == NULL)
05853                 GOTO(out, rc = -ENXIO);
05854 
05855         if (dev->dd_record_fid_accessed) {
05856                 /* The first iteration against the rbtree, scan the whole rbtree
05857                  * to remove the nodes which do NOT need to be handled. */
05858                 write_lock(&llsd->llsd_rb_lock);
05859                 if (dev->dd_record_fid_accessed) {
05860                         struct rb_node                  *node;
05861                         struct rb_node                  *next;
05862                         struct lfsck_rbtree_node        *lrn;
05863 
05864                         /* No need to record the fid accessing anymore. */
05865                         dev->dd_record_fid_accessed = 0;
05866 
05867                         node = rb_first(&llsd->llsd_rb_root);
05868                         while (node != NULL) {
05869                                 next = rb_next(node);
05870                                 lrn = rb_entry(node, struct lfsck_rbtree_node,
05871                                                lrn_node);
05872                                 if (atomic_read(&lrn->lrn_known_count) <=
05873                                     atomic_read(&lrn->lrn_accessed_count)) {
05874                                         rb_erase(node, &llsd->llsd_rb_root);
05875                                         lfsck_rbtree_free(lrn);
05876                                 }
05877                                 node = next;
05878                         }
05879                 }
05880                 write_unlock(&llsd->llsd_rb_lock);
05881         }
05882 
05883         /* read lock the rbtree when init, and unlock when fini */
05884         read_lock(&llsd->llsd_rb_lock);
05885         it->loi_com = com;
05886         com = NULL;
05887 
05888         GOTO(out, rc = 0);
05889 
05890 out:
05891         if (com != NULL)
05892                 lfsck_component_put(env, com);
05893 
05894         CDEBUG(D_LFSCK, "%s: init the orphan iteration: rc = %d\n",
05895                lfsck_lfsck2name(lfsck), rc);
05896 
05897         lfsck_instance_put(env, lfsck);
05898         if (rc != 0) {
05899                 if (it != NULL)
05900                         OBD_FREE_PTR(it);
05901 
05902                 it = (struct lfsck_orphan_it *)ERR_PTR(rc);
05903         }
05904 
05905         return (struct dt_it *)it;
05906 }
05907 
05908 static void lfsck_orphan_it_fini(const struct lu_env *env,
05909                                  struct dt_it *di)
05910 {
05911         struct lfsck_orphan_it           *it    = (struct lfsck_orphan_it *)di;
05912         struct lfsck_component           *com   = it->loi_com;
05913         struct lfsck_layout_slave_data   *llsd;
05914         struct lfsck_layout_slave_target *llst;
05915 
05916         if (com != NULL) {
05917                 CDEBUG(D_LFSCK, "%s: fini the orphan iteration\n",
05918                        lfsck_lfsck2name(com->lc_lfsck));
05919 
05920                 llsd = com->lc_data;
05921                 read_unlock(&llsd->llsd_rb_lock);
05922                 llst = it->loi_llst;
05923                 LASSERT(llst != NULL);
05924 
05925                 /* Save the key and hash for iterate next. */
05926                 llst->llst_fid = it->loi_key;
05927                 llst->llst_hash = it->loi_hash;
05928                 lfsck_layout_llst_put(llst);
05929                 lfsck_component_put(env, com);
05930         }
05931         OBD_FREE_PTR(it);
05932 }
05933 
05939 static int lfsck_orphan_it_next(const struct lu_env *env,
05940                                 struct dt_it *di)
05941 {
05942         struct lfsck_thread_info        *info   = lfsck_env_info(env);
05943         struct filter_fid_old           *pfid   = &info->lti_old_pfid;
05944         struct lu_attr                  *la     = &info->lti_la;
05945         struct lfsck_orphan_it          *it     = (struct lfsck_orphan_it *)di;
05946         struct lu_fid                   *key    = &it->loi_key;
05947         struct lu_orphan_rec            *rec    = &it->loi_rec;
05948         struct lfsck_component          *com    = it->loi_com;
05949         struct lfsck_instance           *lfsck  = com->lc_lfsck;
05950         struct lfsck_layout_slave_data  *llsd   = com->lc_data;
05951         struct dt_object                *obj;
05952         struct lfsck_rbtree_node        *lrn;
05953         int                              pos;
05954         int                              rc;
05955         __u32                            save;
05956         __u32                            idx    = it->loi_llst->llst_index;
05957         bool                             exact  = false;
05958         ENTRY;
05959 
05960         if (it->loi_over)
05961                 RETURN(1);
05962 
05963 again0:
05964         lrn = it->loi_lrn;
05965         if (lrn == NULL) {
05966                 lrn = lfsck_rbtree_search(llsd, key, &exact);
05967                 if (lrn == NULL) {
05968                         it->loi_over = 1;
05969                         RETURN(1);
05970                 }
05971 
05972                 it->loi_lrn = lrn;
05973                 if (!exact) {
05974                         key->f_seq = lrn->lrn_seq;
05975                         key->f_oid = lrn->lrn_first_oid;
05976                         key->f_ver = 0;
05977                 }
05978         } else {
05979                 key->f_oid++;
05980                 if (unlikely(key->f_oid == 0)) {
05981                         key->f_seq++;
05982                         it->loi_lrn = NULL;
05983                         goto again0;
05984                 }
05985 
05986                 if (key->f_oid >=
05987                     lrn->lrn_first_oid + LFSCK_RBTREE_BITMAP_WIDTH) {
05988                         it->loi_lrn = NULL;
05989                         goto again0;
05990                 }
05991         }
05992 
05993         if (unlikely(atomic_read(&lrn->lrn_known_count) <=
05994                      atomic_read(&lrn->lrn_accessed_count))) {
05995                 struct rb_node *next = rb_next(&lrn->lrn_node);
05996 
05997                 while (next != NULL) {
05998                         lrn = rb_entry(next, struct lfsck_rbtree_node,
05999                                        lrn_node);
06000                         if (atomic_read(&lrn->lrn_known_count) >
06001                             atomic_read(&lrn->lrn_accessed_count))
06002                                 break;
06003                         next = rb_next(next);
06004                 }
06005 
06006                 if (next == NULL) {
06007                         it->loi_over = 1;
06008                         RETURN(1);
06009                 }
06010 
06011                 it->loi_lrn = lrn;
06012                 key->f_seq = lrn->lrn_seq;
06013                 key->f_oid = lrn->lrn_first_oid;
06014                 key->f_ver = 0;
06015         }
06016 
06017         pos = key->f_oid - lrn->lrn_first_oid;
06018 
06019 again1:
06020         pos = find_next_bit(lrn->lrn_known_bitmap,
06021                             LFSCK_RBTREE_BITMAP_WIDTH, pos);
06022         if (pos >= LFSCK_RBTREE_BITMAP_WIDTH) {
06023                 key->f_oid = lrn->lrn_first_oid + pos;
06024                 if (unlikely(key->f_oid < lrn->lrn_first_oid)) {
06025                         key->f_seq++;
06026                         key->f_oid = 0;
06027                 }
06028                 it->loi_lrn = NULL;
06029                 goto again0;
06030         }
06031 
06032         if (test_bit(pos, lrn->lrn_accessed_bitmap)) {
06033                 pos++;
06034                 goto again1;
06035         }
06036 
06037         key->f_oid = lrn->lrn_first_oid + pos;
06038         obj = lfsck_object_find_bottom(env, lfsck, key);
06039         if (IS_ERR(obj)) {
06040                 rc = PTR_ERR(obj);
06041                 if (rc == -ENOENT) {
06042                         pos++;
06043                         goto again1;
06044                 }
06045                 RETURN(rc);
06046         }
06047 
06048         dt_read_lock(env, obj, 0);
06049         if (dt_object_exists(obj) == 0 ||
06050             lfsck_is_dead_obj(obj)) {
06051                 dt_read_unlock(env, obj);
06052                 lfsck_object_put(env, obj);
06053                 pos++;
06054                 goto again1;
06055         }
06056 
06057         rc = dt_attr_get(env, obj, la);
06058         if (rc != 0)
06059                 GOTO(out, rc);
06060 
06061         rc = dt_xattr_get(env, obj, lfsck_buf_get(env, pfid, sizeof(*pfid)),
06062                           XATTR_NAME_FID);
06063         if (rc == -ENODATA) {
06064                 /* For the pre-created OST-object, update the bitmap to avoid
06065                  * others LFSCK (second phase) iteration to touch it again. */
06066                 if (la->la_ctime == 0) {
06067                         if (!test_and_set_bit(pos, lrn->lrn_accessed_bitmap))
06068                                 atomic_inc(&lrn->lrn_accessed_count);
06069 
06070                         /* For the race between repairing dangling referenced
06071                          * MDT-object and unlink the file, it may left orphan
06072                          * OST-object there. Destroy it now! */
06073                         if (unlikely(!(la->la_mode & S_ISUID))) {
06074                                 dt_read_unlock(env, obj);
06075                                 lfsck_layout_destroy_orphan(env, obj);
06076                                 lfsck_object_put(env, obj);
06077                                 pos++;
06078                                 goto again1;
06079                         }
06080                 } else if (idx == 0) {
06081                         /* If the orphan OST-object has no parent information,
06082                          * regard it as referenced by the MDT-object on MDT0. */
06083                         fid_zero(&rec->lor_fid);
06084                         rec->lor_uid = la->la_uid;
06085                         rec->lor_gid = la->la_gid;
06086                         GOTO(out, rc = 0);
06087                 }
06088 
06089                 dt_read_unlock(env, obj);
06090                 lfsck_object_put(env, obj);
06091                 pos++;
06092                 goto again1;
06093         }
06094 
06095         if (rc < 0)
06096                 GOTO(out, rc);
06097 
06098         if (rc != sizeof(struct filter_fid) &&
06099             rc != sizeof(struct filter_fid_old))
06100                 GOTO(out, rc = -EINVAL);
06101 
06102         fid_le_to_cpu(&rec->lor_fid, &pfid->ff_parent);
06103         /* Currently, the filter_fid::ff_parent::f_ver is not the real parent
06104          * MDT-object's FID::f_ver, instead it is the OST-object index in its
06105          * parent MDT-object's layout EA. */
06106         save = rec->lor_fid.f_stripe_idx;
06107         rec->lor_fid.f_ver = 0;
06108         rc = lfsck_fid_match_idx(env, lfsck, &rec->lor_fid, idx);
06109         /* If the orphan OST-object does not claim the MDT, then next.
06110          *
06111          * If we do not know whether it matches or not, then return it
06112          * to the MDT for further check. */
06113         if (rc == 0) {
06114                 dt_read_unlock(env, obj);
06115                 lfsck_object_put(env, obj);
06116                 pos++;
06117                 goto again1;
06118         }
06119 
06120         rec->lor_fid.f_stripe_idx = save;
06121         rec->lor_uid = la->la_uid;
06122         rec->lor_gid = la->la_gid;
06123 
06124         CDEBUG(D_LFSCK, "%s: return orphan "DFID", PFID "DFID", owner %u:%u\n",
06125                lfsck_lfsck2name(com->lc_lfsck), PFID(key), PFID(&rec->lor_fid),
06126                rec->lor_uid, rec->lor_gid);
06127 
06128         GOTO(out, rc = 0);
06129 
06130 out:
06131         dt_read_unlock(env, obj);
06132         lfsck_object_put(env, obj);
06133         if (rc == 0)
06134                 it->loi_hash++;
06135 
06136         return rc;
06137 }
06138 
06145 static int lfsck_orphan_it_get(const struct lu_env *env,
06146                                struct dt_it *di,
06147                                const struct dt_key *key)
06148 {
06149         struct lfsck_orphan_it  *it   = (struct lfsck_orphan_it *)di;
06150         int                      rc;
06151 
06152         it->loi_key = *(struct lu_fid *)key;
06153         rc = lfsck_orphan_it_next(env, di);
06154         if (rc == 1)
06155                 return 0;
06156 
06157         if (rc == 0)
06158                 return 1;
06159 
06160         return rc;
06161 }
06162 
06163 static void lfsck_orphan_it_put(const struct lu_env *env,
06164                                 struct dt_it *di)
06165 {
06166 }
06167 
06168 static struct dt_key *lfsck_orphan_it_key(const struct lu_env *env,
06169                                           const struct dt_it *di)
06170 {
06171         struct lfsck_orphan_it *it = (struct lfsck_orphan_it *)di;
06172 
06173         return (struct dt_key *)&it->loi_key;
06174 }
06175 
06176 static int lfsck_orphan_it_key_size(const struct lu_env *env,
06177                                     const struct dt_it *di)
06178 {
06179         return sizeof(struct lu_fid);
06180 }
06181 
06182 static int lfsck_orphan_it_rec(const struct lu_env *env,
06183                                const struct dt_it *di,
06184                                struct dt_rec *rec,
06185                                __u32 attr)
06186 {
06187         struct lfsck_orphan_it *it = (struct lfsck_orphan_it *)di;
06188 
06189         *(struct lu_orphan_rec *)rec = it->loi_rec;
06190 
06191         return 0;
06192 }
06193 
06194 static __u64 lfsck_orphan_it_store(const struct lu_env *env,
06195                                    const struct dt_it *di)
06196 {
06197         struct lfsck_orphan_it  *it   = (struct lfsck_orphan_it *)di;
06198 
06199         return it->loi_hash;
06200 }
06201 
06208 static int lfsck_orphan_it_load(const struct lu_env *env,
06209                                 const struct dt_it *di,
06210                                 __u64 hash)
06211 {
06212         struct lfsck_orphan_it           *it   = (struct lfsck_orphan_it *)di;
06213         struct lfsck_layout_slave_target *llst = it->loi_llst;
06214         int                               rc;
06215 
06216         LASSERT(llst != NULL);
06217 
06218         if (hash != llst->llst_hash) {
06219                 CDEBUG(D_LFSCK, "%s: the given hash "LPU64" for orphan "
06220                        "iteration does not match the one when fini "
06221                        LPU64", to be reset.\n",
06222                        lfsck_lfsck2name(it->loi_com->lc_lfsck), hash,
06223                        llst->llst_hash);
06224                 fid_zero(&llst->llst_fid);
06225                 llst->llst_hash = 0;
06226         }
06227 
06228         it->loi_key = llst->llst_fid;
06229         it->loi_hash = llst->llst_hash;
06230         rc = lfsck_orphan_it_next(env, (struct dt_it *)di);
06231         if (rc == 1)
06232                 return 0;
06233 
06234         if (rc == 0)
06235                 return 1;
06236 
06237         return rc;
06238 }
06239 
06240 static int lfsck_orphan_it_key_rec(const struct lu_env *env,
06241                                    const struct dt_it *di,
06242                                    void *key_rec)
06243 {
06244         return 0;
06245 }
06246 
06247 const struct dt_index_operations lfsck_orphan_index_ops = {
06248         .dio_lookup             = lfsck_orphan_index_lookup,
06249         .dio_declare_insert     = lfsck_orphan_index_declare_insert,
06250         .dio_insert             = lfsck_orphan_index_insert,
06251         .dio_declare_delete     = lfsck_orphan_index_declare_delete,
06252         .dio_delete             = lfsck_orphan_index_delete,
06253         .dio_it = {
06254                 .init           = lfsck_orphan_it_init,
06255                 .fini           = lfsck_orphan_it_fini,
06256                 .get            = lfsck_orphan_it_get,
06257                 .put            = lfsck_orphan_it_put,
06258                 .next           = lfsck_orphan_it_next,
06259                 .key            = lfsck_orphan_it_key,
06260                 .key_size       = lfsck_orphan_it_key_size,
06261                 .rec            = lfsck_orphan_it_rec,
06262                 .store          = lfsck_orphan_it_store,
06263                 .load           = lfsck_orphan_it_load,
06264                 .key_rec        = lfsck_orphan_it_key_rec,
06265         }
